A4.text: As an endocrine gland, it functions mostly to regulate blood sugar levels, secreting the hormones insulin, glucagon, somatostatin and pancreatic polypeptide.

A5.text: The pancreas is an organ of the digestive system and endocrine system of vertebrates.
